title: (Solved) Level 16 and still cannot post on "Player Recruitment"
body:
"You have to be level 7" it says, BUT IM LEVEL 16. 

QwQ Let me post so I can find friends to play with, ugh ... 

Halp please.

{{champion:35}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:35}}

replies.body: It will take a minute for your boards profile to sync when you post for the first time.  Everything looks fine now.  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rVgpvkaE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-12T23:21:08.740+0000)
>
> It will take a minute for your boards profile to sync when you post for the first time.  Everything looks fine now.  :D

Okie I feel stupid, I've literally waited 2 weeks for this thing to fix. I didn't know I had to post in the forums for it to unlock, wow ...  ._.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
It's not your fault, profiles don't always sync.  We can also help out through a ticket by manually attempting to sync you as well!
